'''2.1.2467-beta''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.2468-beta''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.2466-beta''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on February 14, 2019.

== Changes ==
* The progress bar now updates properly in the "Prepare" phase.
* Speed of the "Prepare" phase has been improved on multi-core machines.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug causing game launches to stall on Linux.
* Fixed an error that would pop up when changing game directory in any configuration.
* Fixed the launcher update progress bar not working on mac.
* Fixed sounds not working in Minecraft versions prior to 1.6.
* {{bug|MCL-6280}}: No sound in older versions on native launcher, despite working in the Java launcher.
* {{bug|MCL-10486}}: minecraft-launcher 2.1.2339 hangs trying to load / run any version of minecraft.
</onlyinclude>
